snippet: Seagate's GoFlex Thunderbolt Adapter is a small station in which one can mount a hard drive and connect it to a computer with a fast Thunderbolt cable.
abstract: Seagate's GoFlex Thunderbolt Adapter is a small station in which one can mount a hard drive and connect it to a computer with a fast Thunderbolt cable.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS -- Seagate on Tuesday introduced an accessory that will give some hard drives a major performance boost.

headline.main: Seagate Adapter Hits Hard Drives With a Thunderbolt
